nodes.bodyText:
Can we do this check directly in the renderRowContent? Seems like this.state.path === this.getFilePath() && content.name === this.getFileName() should be available in the specific function.
Avoids passing this prop down multiple levels.
You can do the full check there, but my concern was that perform the path check once per row was excessive. If you think it's not a concern, I can make the change.
I think that should be ok. Its a constant time operation (1 check).
